trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the ghost of bael durin has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ghost of bael durin can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 4 ({@dice 1d8}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk msa} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
